___eol.description: The EOL identifier of the taxa

___gbif.description: The GBIF identifier of the taxa

___ncbi.description: The NCBI Taxonomy identifier of the taxa

___status.description: The taxonomic status of the taxa.

___traits.description: A list of traits values indentifiers (or URIs) that were measured on this taxa. Good for taxa-level traits.

___name.description: The scientific name of the taxa

___bold.description: The BOLD identifier of the taxa

___description.description: A short description of the taxa

___vernacular.description: The vernacular name of the taxa, in English

___owner.description: URI of the taxa owner. When submitting from the R package, this field is populated automatically.
